item.description: hscrypt demos Examples using hscrypt and hscrypt-webpack-plugin to encrypt and deploy static sites. hscrypt simulates “anyone with the link can view” permissioning for publicly-hosted static web apps (e.g. on GitHub Pages). Please read the Disclaimer section before using. Hello World Here’s a simple example (taken from 00-simple: <!-- index.html --> <html> <body> This page is encrypted! Please provide password as URL hash. </body> </html> // secret.js document.body.innerHTML = 'secret message üêø' // inject secret message (or an entire application!
